channel.title: Pages on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on David Collantes

item.title: Nín hǎo!
item.description: Ego Hi there, welcome! You are now browsing my personal blog. In here I write about whatever happens to interest me from time to time. I am a father and a husband living in Orlando, FL, U.S.A. I have worked for the Florida Educational System as a system administrator (sysadmin) since June of 1996 or whereabouts, but nothing on this site is affiliated with, sponsored, or endorsed by them.

item.title: Browser Based Tools
item.description: These are several tools compiled from all around, that I use every once in a while. I keep them here, just because it is handy to have them all in one place. All of them run in the browser, no server side component, other than holding and serving the files via HTTPS. Tools AES encryption AES file encryption Brainwallet Diceware Hash Password generator Rushwallet Shamir encryption Shortly pastebin TextPad URL encoding/decoding WarpWallet One Time Pad Encryption

item.title: Error 403
item.description: Sorry, but you can’t access this resource (error 403). This can be happening because: Directory listing is not allowed. Resource is protected, and you did not provide the proper authentication. The server has a misconfiguration. If you think you should have permissions right to this resource, or if you think the server might be improperly configured, please contact me. I apologise for any inconvenience.

item.title: Error 404
item.description: My apologies, the resource you were looking for cannot be found (the server returned an error 404). This can be happening for several reasons: The resource you were looking for has been either moved or deleted. The resource may be temporarily unavailable but it may become available again in the future. Perhaps there was a mistake on the address entered on the web browser? Kindly double check the address and try again.
